# robots.txt
# Generated by Website Factory
# https://example.com

# Allow all crawlers
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow Next.js internal routes
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /api/

# Disallow admin and private areas (if any)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/

# Disallow data files
Disallow: /*.json$

# Sitemap location
# PLACEHOLDER: Update domain before deployment
Sitemap: https://example.com/sitemap.xml
